text:
Hi, is there a way I could ask for all the details from a contact?
I have the get_by_id (that would be this endpoint "<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/{id}>"), but it only gives me a few properties of the contact.

Yes, you append with `?properties=` and then a comma-separated string of the properties you want. 

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>
You can find more details in the API docs here

Hello everyone!

It looks like `GET <https://api.hubapi.com/automation/v4/actions>` is down:
```500
{
    "status": "error",
    "message": "There was a problem with the request.",
    "correlationId": "507fbd32-ec85-4f53-84be-78d64654fb45"
}```
Sometimes 200, but it takes a very long time (~30s) to work
I've posted an issue I am having with the v3 lists api in the #list-api-v3 channel. Can anyone help out? kinda time sensitive

yeah, you could configure it like a normal OAUTH flow because once you have the response token, you can grab their details from API with the token. Just make sure you have the correct APP permissions.

hey, has anyone ever had this issue with the OAuth apis?

```{"status":"error","message":"The OAuth token used to make this call expired 0 second(s) ago.","correlationId":"2cf1ffc6-0784-43aa-a016-88c320938381","category":"EXPIRED_AUTHENTICATION","context":{"expire time":["2023-10-30T15:15:04.007Z"]}}```
I've got a bunch of 401 errors in an integration with HS caused by this. doesn't make a whole lot of sense that all of them (800 errors) were basically caused by a token that expired 0 seconds ago :open_mouth:
How can I get the margin through the API?
How to dynamically pass the HubSpot private app access-token in the workflow custom code?

Hi All,

Is there any way to get the line items properties via an api?

1. Billing Start Date
2. terms
3. Billing Frequency
4. Currency
you help will be appreciated <@U01QVR44MEY>
Is there a campaign API? For either Marketing Campaigns or even ads campaigns??
